item.title: Add comments to your Hugo-Academic blog in 10 minutes, using Utteranc.es
item.description: Utteranc.es is a lightweigth comments widget, which allows you to use Github Issues for blog comments. It’s open source, looks clean, comments are stored on Github, and even comes with a dark theme. Sure, you need to sign with Github, but that’s fine since most coders already have an account.
